summary: App for storing and organizing collections of photocard images in a customizable digital binder, including image uploads, sticker editing, drag-and-drop ordering, and binder theming.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Scrapbook-style binder cover texture with subtle grain and stitched edges (binder-cover-texture.dim_2048x2048.png)
- Cream paper page background texture with light grain (page-paper-texture.dim_2048x2048.png)
- Set of 6 cute sticker illustrations on transparent backgrounds (star, heart, sparkle, tape strip, flower, smiley) (stickers-pack-01.dim_1024x1024.png)

existing_features.title: Implement Internet Identity sign-in and ensure all photocard binder data is stored and fetched per signed-in user (keyed by the user Principal).
Implement image upload flow for photocards: allow users to add a photocard by uploading an image file; store the image content in a way that can be retrieved and displayed later.
Add an in-browser photocard editor that lets users place and manipulate stickers on top of their uploaded image and save the edited result as that card’s display image.
Implement drag-and-drop reordering of photocards within a binder, and persist the new order to the backend.

Implement binder appearance customization: allow users to change binder theme properties (e.g., cover color/texture, page background style, and card frame style) and persist these settings per binder.

Create core UI screens: (1) Binder Library (list/create/open/delete binders), (2) Binder View (grid/list of cards with reorder), (3) Add Card (upload), (4) Edit Card (sticker editor), (5) Binder Settings (theme customization).

Apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme across the app UI: choose a warm ‘scrapbook stationery’ style (cream paper backgrounds, muted coral + sage accents, subtle grain/texture, rounded corners, playful but readable typography) and apply it consistently to layout, buttons, cards, and dialogs.
Add generated static image assets (binder/page textures and a starter sticker set) under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the binder customization UI and sticker tray.

new_feature_requests.summary: Store and manage collections of photocard images in a digital binder
Allow users to upload their own photos/images into their collection
Provide editing tools to add stickers to user-uploaded images
Support drag-and-drop reordering of photocards within a binder/collection
Allow users to customize the look/theme of their digital photocard binder
Create backend data models and API methods to manage binder collections: create/list/update/delete binders; create/list/update/delete photocards within a binder; persist binder and card ordering.

projectName: Digital photocard binder with uploads, sticker editing, drag-and-drop ordering, and binder customization
